page.title: 09COMMUNITY FUND RAISING
page.content: Sherston has a habit of collecting money for all kinds of charities. Hardly a week passes without at least one{fund raising event.}The recipients of the money range from local bodies such as the Church,the Community Centre,all the Youth Organisations, Hospitals used by the village & to numerous National charities. The methods of raising money can be small events for example ,coffee mornings, jumble sales & sales of work; or by larger events such as the yearly {Carnivals}and elaborate affairs involving food & drink.One young member of the community made a sponsored parachute jump which benefited both the village and a national cancer charity.No matter what the good cause is,Sherston people give generously.
